subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova beat Agnieszka Radwanska, 6-4, 6-3, to extend her unbeaten run to 13 matches and set up an all-Russian final at the Qatar Open. Sharapova, who lost to Radwanska at the United States Open, will face Vera Zvonareva in Sunday’s final.
snippet: Maria Sharapova beat Agnieszka Radwanska, 6-4, 6-3, to extend her unbeaten run to 13 matches and set up an all-Russian final at the Qatar Open. Sharapova, who lost to Radwanska at the United States Open, will face Vera Zvonareva in Sunday’s final.
